title: John Lennon - Lennon Legend - (FLAC)
description:

                        a.k.a: John Winston Lennon [birth name], John Ono Lennon, Dr Winston O&#039;Boogie,

						Booker Table & The Maitre D&#039;s, Captain Kundalini, Dwarf McDougal, Dr Dream, Winston Leg-Thigh

A5	Power to the People	
A6	Cold Turkey	
A7	Love	
A8	Mind Games	
A9	Whatever Gets You Thru the Night	
A10	#9 Dream	
B1	Stand By Me	
B2	(Just Like) Standing Over	
B3	Woman	
B4	Beautiful Boy (Darling Boy)

Playing Time Side A .........: 00:37:38
Playing Time Side B .........: 00:37:45
Total Size...........: 483 MB		
	
On this cassette track I increase the record/playback level +15 dB for boost.
I also reduced the background noise level during PLAYBACK using Dolby B NR.
The reason I used Dolby B instead of Dolby C or S was they caused too much 
reduction at high frequencies which I do not like. I hope you feel the same.
There is one rough spot (at the end of Nobody Told Me Side B) on this cassette. 
Which is reason I made a digital copy for backup. Listen and enjoy... HUYE

Tracks are encoded losslessly in FLAC format (16 bit, stereo, 44.1 kHz). 
For more information about FLAC visit http://flac.sourceforge.net/

Good News! Yoko Ono does not sing solo on this one.
